tool_description: Creates engaging and informative release notes for app updates, highlighting new features, improvements, and bug fixes in user-friendly language.

writing_style.description: Writing style: casual, professional, creative, or technical

max_length.description: Maximum character length for release notes

error_messages: Version number invalid: Version number format is not valid.
Invalid writing style: Style must be 'casual', 'professional', 'creative', or 'technical'.
Max length invalid: Maximum length must be between 100 and 4000 characters.
No content provided: At least one of new_features, improvements, or bug_fixes must be provided.
usage: Provide version_number and at least one content array (new_features, improvements, or bug_fixes). Optionally set writing_style and max_length. Returns polished release notes ready for publication.

character_count.description: Total character count of generated release notes

sections_included.description: List of sections included in the release notes

engagement_score.description: Predicted user engagement score from 0 to 100
